data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhou, Yu-Lingzi, Zhou, Hong-Zhang (2014): Taxonomy of the genus Erymus Bordoni (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae, Staphylininae, Xantholinini) in China with descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 3814 (4): 521-536, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3814.4.5
